Welcome to imdlib’s documentation!¶

IMDLIB is a python package to download and handle binary grided data from India Meteorological Department (IMD). For more information about the IMD datasets, follow the following link: IMD Pune. It heavily employes the xarray to produce the final netCDF datasets.
